mapper.select: SELECT `id` FROM `gym` WHERE `categoryId`=#{categoryId} ORDER BY `id` ${sort} LIMIT 1

SELECT `id` ,`name` ,`categoryId` ,`location` ,`phoneNumber` ,`introduce` ,`rank` ,`image` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `gym` WHERE `categoryId`=#{categoryId} AND
`location` LIKE '%강남구%'
`location` LIKE '%서초구 %'
`location` LIKE '%송파구 %'
`location` LIKE '%관악구 %'
`location` LIKE '%용산구 %'
`location` LIKE '%마포구 %'
`location` LIKE '%성동구 %'
ORDER BY `id` DESC
AND `id` < #{standardId}
ORDER BY `id` DESC
AND `id` > #{standardId}
ORDER BY `id` ASC
LIMIT ${limit}

SELECT `id` ,`name` ,`categoryId` ,`location` ,`phoneNumber` ,`introduce` ,`rank` ,`image` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `gym` WHERE `categoryId`=#{categoryId} AND
`location` LIKE '%강남구%'
`location` LIKE '%서초구 %'
`location` LIKE '%송파구 %'
`location` LIKE '%관악구 %'
`location` LIKE '%용산구 %'

SELECT `id` ,`name` ,`categoryId` ,`location` ,`phoneNumber` ,`introduce` ,`rank` ,`image` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `gym` WHERE `id` IN (SELECT `gymId` FROM `enroll` WHERE `userId` = #{userId} ORDER BY `createdAt` )

SELECT `id` ,`name` ,`categoryId` ,`location` ,`phoneNumber` ,`introduce` ,`rank` ,`image` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `gym` WHERE `id` in (SELECT `workoutId` FROM `like` WHERE `userId` = #{userId} AND `type` = #{type})

SELECT `id` ,`name` ,`categoryId` ,`location` ,`phoneNumber` ,`introduce` ,`rank` ,`image` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `gym` WHERE `id` in (select `workoutId` from `qna` where `type` = 'gym' and `userId` = #{userId})
